```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(igraph)
library(readr)

bill_sponsers_data <- read_csv("bill_sponsers_data.csv")

bill_sponsers_data <- bill_sponsers_data %>%
  mutate(sponsor = ifelse(position == 1, TRUE, FALSE))

fowler_congress <- read_csv("govtrack_cosponsor_data_111_congress.csv") %>%
  mutate(bill_number = ifelse(grepl("hconres"), TRUE, FALSE)))



```
